compute the prediction stats of a model

Source: R/ML.funs.r
predStats.numerical.Rd

This function computes the prediction stats of a model on the target variable of type numeric.

Usage

predStats.numerical(
  mFit,
  newData,
  classInd,
  ofPre = NULL,
  predVals = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

mFit

the model

newData

data.frame; the new data

classInd

integer; the index of the class column

ofPre

NULL, char; the prefix of output file

predVals

NULL, data.frame; supplied prediction.

...

passed to caret::predict.train()

posLabel

NULL, char; the positive labels

Value

a named numerical vector of R2, RMSE, MAE

Details

Following files are the output:

  • cor.png

  • residule.png

  • prediction.csv

  • model.stats.txt

  • all.stats.rds

Examples

# none
